scripts.publish:eth: npm run codegen:eth && npm run build:eth && graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ jpyc-ethereum-analytics subgraph.yaml --version-label $SUBGRAPH_VERSION
scripts.publish:pol: npm run codegen:pol && npm run build:pol && graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ jpyc-polygon-analytics subgraph.polygon.yaml --version-label $SUBGRAPH_VERSION
scripts.publish:avax: npm run codegen:avax && npm run build:avax && graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ jpyc-avalanche-analytics subgraph.avalanche.yaml --version-label $SUBGRAPH_VERSION
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:eth && npm run publish:pol && npm run publish:avax
